metadata.title: Ensure Password Policy Is in Place
metadata.description: Ensure Password Policy Is in Place

criterion.comment: Ensure 'validate_password_length' is greater than or equal to '14'Ensure 'validate_password_mixed_case_count' is greater than or equal to '1'Ensure 'validate_password_number_count' is greater than or equal to '1'Ensure 'validate_password_special_char_count' is greater than or equal to '1'Ensure 'validate_password_policy' is set to 'MEDIUM' or 'STRONG'Ensure 'plugin-load' Is Set to 'validate_password.so'Ensure 'validate-password' Is Set to 'FORCE_PLUS_PERMANENT'

Ensure 'validate_password_length' is greater than or equal to '14'Ensure 'validate_password_mixed_case_count' is greater than or equal to '1'Ensure 'validate_password_number_count' is greater than or equal to '1'Ensure 'validate_password_special_char_count' is greater than or equal to '1'Ensure 'validate_password_policy' is set to 'MEDIUM' or 'STRONG'Ensure 'plugin-load' Is Set to 'validate_password.so'Ensure 'validate-password' Is Set to 'FORCE_PLUS_PERMANENT'

metadata.title: Ensure No Users Have Wildcard Hostnames
metadata.description: Ensure No Users Have Wildcard Hostnames

criterion.comment: Ensure 'host' is not equal to '%' for all users

metadata.title: Ensure No Anonymous Accounts Exist
metadata.description: Ensure No Anonymous Accounts Exist

metadata.title: Ensure 'have_ssl' Is Set to 'YES'
metadata.description: Ensure 'have_ssl' Is Set to 'YES'

metadata.title: Ensure 'ssl_type' Is Set to 'ANY', 'X509', or 'SPECIFIED' for All Remote Users
metadata.description: Ensure 'ssl_type' Is Set to 'ANY', 'X509', or 'SPECIFIED' for All Remote Users

criterion.comment: Ensure 'ssl_type' is not blank for any user

metadata.title: Ensure 'MASTER_SSL_VERIFY_SERVER_CERT' Is Set to 'YES' or '1'
metadata.description: Ensure 'MASTER_SSL_VERIFY_SERVER_CERT' Is Set to 'YES' or '1'

metadata.title: Ensure 'master_info_repository' Is Set to 'TABLE'
metadata.description: Ensure 'master_info_repository' Is Set to 'TABLE'

metadata.title: Ensure 'super_priv' Is Not Set to 'Y' for Replication Users
metadata.description: Ensure 'super_priv' Is Not Set to 'Y' for Replication Users

metadata.title: Ensure No Replication Users Have Wildcard Hostnames
metadata.description: Ensure No Replication Users Have Wildcard Hostnames

family_test.comment: installed operating system is part of the Unix family

symlink_test.comment: Ensure '.mysql_history' Is Symbolically Linked To '/dev/null' For All Users

textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure 'MYSQL_PWD' Environment Variable Is Not In Use
Ensure Interactive Login Is Disabled for 'mysql' User
Ensure 'password' setting does not exist in configuration file

sql57_test.comment: Ensure 'host' is not equal to '%' for all users
Ensure 'ssl_type' is not blank for any user

sql57_object.sql: select if(VARIABLE_VALUE='','/setting/is/not/set',VARIABLE_VALUE) as variable_value FROM ( SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_VARIABLES WHERE variable_name = 'log_bin_basename' ) as temp;
select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_VARIABLES where variable_name = 'log_error'
select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_VARIABLES where variable_name = 'slow_query_log_file'

select if(VARIABLE_VALUE='','/setting/is/not/set',VARIABLE_VALUE) as variable_value FROM ( SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_VARIABLES WHERE variable_name = 'relay_log_basename' ) as temp;
select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_VARIABLES where variable_name = 'general_log_file'
select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_VARIABLES where variable_name = 'ssl_key'
select VARIABLE_VALUE from information_schema.GLOBAL_VARIABLES where variable_name like '%audit_log_file%';
select VARIABLE_VALUE as datadir from information_schema.GLOBAL_VARIABLES where variable_name like '%datadir%';
select load_option from information_schema.plugins where plugin_name='audit_log'
SELECT User,host FROM mysql.user WHERE authentication_string=''
SELECT user, host FROM mysql.user WHERE host = '%'
SELECT user,host FROM mysql.user WHERE user = ''
SELECT user, host, ssl_type FROM mysql.user WHERE NOT HOST IN ('::1', '127.0.0.1', 'localhost') AND ssl_type != 'ANY' AND ssl_type != 'X509' AND ssl_type != 'SPECIFIED';
select host from mysql.user where user='repl' and host = '%';

external_variable.comment: Ensure '.mysql_history' Is Symbolically Linked To '/dev/null' For All Users
Ensure 'MYSQL_PWD' Environment Variable Is Not In Use
Ensure Interactive Login Is Disabled for 'mysql' User
Ensure 'password' setting does not exist in configuration file
Ensure 'host' is not equal to '%' for all users
Ensure 'ssl_type' is not blank for any user

local_variable.comment: Local variable reference for SQL statement construction: Ensure 'super_priv' equals 'N' for 'repl' user

concat.literal_component: select user, host from mysql.user where user='
